llcFormation.title: LLC Formation
llcFormation.subtitle: Everything you need to know about forming a Limited Liability Company
llcFormation.whatIsLlcDescription: A Limited Liability Company (LLC) is a business structure that combines the pass-through taxation of a partnership or sole proprietorship with the limited liability protection of a corporation.
llcFormation.whatIsLlcDescription2: LLCs are one of the most popular business structures for small to medium-sized businesses because they offer flexibility in management and taxation while protecting owners' personal assets from business liabilities.
llcFormation.benefit1: Personal asset protection from business debts and lawsuits
llcFormation.benefit2: Tax flexibility - choose how your LLC is taxed
llcFormation.benefit3: Minimal compliance requirements compared to corporations
llcFormation.benefit4: Credibility with customers, vendors, and partners
llcFormation.whatWeHandleDescription: We take care of all the paperwork and filing requirements so you can focus on building your business. Our comprehensive service includes:
llcFormation.ctaDescription: Get started today and have your LLC formed in minutes.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pricing varies by state due to different state filing fees. Select your state in the wizard to see exact pricing for your LLC formation.
pricing.priceDisclaimer: * Prices shown are our service fees. State filing fees are additional and vary by state.
pricing.bankSetupDesc: We help you open a US business bank account
pricing.businessAddressDesc: A physical business address for your LLC
pricing.usPhoneNumberDesc: A dedicated US phone number for your business
pricing.ctaDescription: Select your state to see exact pricing and begin your LLC formation.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing and using FiviMedia's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.section2Content: FiviMedia provides LLC formation services, including but not limited to state filings, registered agent services, EIN applications, and related business formation assistance.
terms.section3Content: You are responsible for providing accurate and complete information during the LLC formation process. Any inaccurate information may result in delays or rejection of filings.
terms.section4Content: All fees are due at the time of order. Prices are subject to change without notice. State filing fees are additional and vary by state.
terms.section5Content: Service fees are non-refundable once the filing process has begun. State filing fees paid on your behalf are non-refundable.
terms.section6Content: FiviMedia shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.
terms.section7Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website.
terms.section8Content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, business information, and payment details when you use our services.
privacy.section2Intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.section2Item1: Process your LLC formation and related services
privacy.section2Item2: Communicate with you about your order and services
privacy.section2Item3: Send you important updates and notifications
privacy.section2Item4: Improve our services and customer experience
privacy.section3Intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
privacy.section3Item1: State agencies for LLC filing purposes
privacy.section3Item3: Service providers who assist in our operations
privacy.section3Item4: Legal authorities when required by law
privacy.section4Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section5Content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You may request deletion of your data by contacting us.
privacy.section7Content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.section8Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
privacy.section9Content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
